title: Privacy policy
content: When you visit this website, we leave a small
file on your computer. It allows us to know how many visits we have and which pages are read the most.
title-why: How comes the website has no disclaimer banner?
content-why: Matomo - our tracking service - is complient with the European RGBD law by default.
